page.title: 06BELLINGHAM SHOPS.
page.content: Bellingham has a number of shops and may be referred to as a small town rather than a big village.It has a number of pubs and hotels and has 11 shops ranging from the co-op to the chemists. There are 3 housing estates,many separate houses and 1 farm inside the village itself. The shops are the newsagency which also sells other stationary,the 2 drapery and hardware shops and the Mace,Butcher's,co-op and Baker's which all sell food and vegetables. There is a snackbar which sells minerals and food. Apart from selling stamps the Post Office also sells stationary. Bellingham has 3 banks,TSB,Barclays and Lloyds.There is also a hairdressers and chemists.Bellingham has a good number of shopping facilities.
